author: jefft
msg: Make the DTD significantly less annoying by loosening constraints on li, dd,
td, th.  These can now contain inline or block elements, defined as a new
'flow' entity.  These changes were made with reference to the xhtml1-strict DTD
20030419 Allow paragraphs (p|source|note|warning|fixme), table and figure|anchor inside li. (JT)
20030419 Allow paragraphs (p|source|note|warning|fixme), lists (ol|ul|dl), table, figure|anchor inside dd. (JT)
20030419 Allow paragraphs (p|source|note|warning|fixme), lists (ol|ul|dl), table, figure|anchor inside tables (td|dh). (JT)

author: jefft
msg: back changes made since Forrest 0.4 was released, which are now in document-v12

author: jefft
msg: new 'document-v12' doctype for post-v0.4 changes to the DTD, and use it in
